name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed unauthorized scripts for data extraction on a critical server.

parallel--c134b713-5c1e-4d18-9794-173f12.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--c134b713-5c1e-4d18-9794-173f12.description: Execute all necessary mitigations for the identified attack on the network.

action--4f69f765-531e-4c56-b16b-abd0b7e8.name: Kill malicious process
action--4f69f765-531e-4c56-b16b-abd0b7e8.description: Terminate any processes running malicious scripts.

action--f0b12edd-2d84-464c-9889-ae5f0b35.name: Isolate compromised host
action--f0b12edd-2d84-464c-9889-ae5f0b35.description: Block all incoming traffic to the compromised host.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) = host-22 ]; then iptables -A INPUT -s 0.0.0.0/0 -j DROP; fi

action--2e6f7b8a-dc33-4af4-b736-3b7966f1.name: Run complete system scan
action--2e6f7b8a-dc33-4af4-b736-3b7966f1.description: Conduct a thorough system scan to ensure no malicious files remain.

commands.command: while ! scan_clean; do run_scan; sleep 60; done

scan_clean.description: Indicates whether the system scan is clean.
